column1: vEdya
prajQApAramitA hRdaya sutram vistara mAtRkA namaH sarvajQAya
column2: @45a / /rgya gar skad du /bha ga wa ti pradzny'a p'a ra mi ta hri da ya / bod skad du / bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po / bam po gcig go / bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo //

column1: evam mayA Srutam ekasmin samaye BagavAn rAjagRhe viharati sma gRDrakUwe parvate mahatA Bikzu saMGena sArDam mahatA ca boDisattva saMGena
column2: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na / bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te /

column1: tena Kalu samayena BagavAn gamBIrO= asaMboDam nAma samADim samApannaH
column2: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das zab mo snang ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //

column1: tena ca samayena Arya avalokita ISvaraH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH gamBIrAyAm prajQApAramitAyAm caryAm caramANaH evam vyavalokayati sma
column2: yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo spyod pa nyid la rnam par lta zhing /

column1: paQca skanDAn= tAn= ca svaBAva SUnyam vyavalokayati aTa AyuzmAn SAriputraH budDa anuBAvena Arya avalokiteSvaram boDisattvam etat avocat  yaH kaScid kula putraH vA kula duhitA vE asyAm gamBIrAprajQApAramitAyAm caryAm cartu kAmaH kaTam SikzitavyaH
column2: phung po lnga po de dag la yang rang bzhin gyis stong par rnam par lta'o //

column1: evam ukte Arya avalokita ISvaraH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH Ayuzmantam SAriputram etat avocat
column2: de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus / tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so //

column1: yaH kaScid SAriputra kula putraH va kula duhitA vE asyAm gamBIrAyAm prajQApAramitAyAm caryAm cartu kAmaH
column2: rigs kyi bu 'am / rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo spyod pa spyad par 'dod pa des @45b ji ltar bslab par bya / de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis che dang ldan ba sha radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so / sh'a ri'i bu / rigs kyi bu'am /

column1: tena evam vyavalokitavyam  paQca skanDAn= tAn= ca svaBAva SUnyAn samanupaSyati sma
column2: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo spyod pa spyad par 'dod pa des 'di ltar rnam par blta bar bya ste; phung po lnga po de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong par rnam par yang dag par rjes su blta'o //

column1: rUpam SUnyatA
column2: gzugs stong pa'o //

column1: SUnyatA eva rUpam
column2: stong pa nyid gzugs so //

column1: rUpAt na pRTak SUnyatA SUnyatAyAH na pRTak rUpam yat rUpam sA SUnyatA yA SUnyatA tad rUpam
column2: gzugs las stong pa nyid gzhan ma yin; stong pa nyid las kyang gzugs gzhan ma yin no //

column1: evam vedanA saMjQA saMskAra vijQAnAni ca SUnyatA
column2: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnams stong pa'o // sh'a ri'i bu; de lta bas na /

column1: evam SAriputra sarva DarmAH SUnyatA lakzaNAH anutpannAH anirudDAH amalAH vimalAH anUnAH asaMpUrNAH
column2: chos thams cad stong pa nyid de / mtshan nyid med pa / ma skyes pa / ma 'gags pa / dri ma med pa / dri ma dang bral ba med pa / bri ba med pa / gang ba med pa'o; ;sh'a ri'i bu /

column1: tasmAt tarhi SAriputra SUnyatAyAm na rUpam
column2: de lta bas na / stong pa nyid la gzugs med /

column1: na vedanA
column2: tshor ba med /

column1: sa saMjQA
column2: 'du shes med /

column1: na saMskArAH
column2: 'du byed rnams med /

column1: na vijQAnam
column2: rnam par shes pa med / mig med /

column1: na cakzuH na Srotram na GrANam na jihvA na kAyaH na manaH na rUpam na SabdaH na ganDaH na rasaH na sprazwavyam na DarmaH
column2: rna ba med; sna med / lce med / lus med / yid med / gzugs med / sgra med / dri med / ro med / reg bya med / chos med do //

column1: na cakzuH DAtuH yAvat na manaH DAtuH na DarmaDAtuH na manaH vijQAna DAtuH
column2: mig gi khams med pa nas / yid kyi khams @46a *// med; yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang med do // ma rig pa med //

column1: na vidyA na avidyA na kzayaH yAvat na jarA maraNam na jarA maraNa kzayaH
column2: ma rig pa zad pa med pa nas / rga shi med / rga shi zad pa'i bar du yang med do //

column1: na duHKa samudaya niroDa mArgA na jQAnam na prAptiH na aprAptiH
column2: sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam med / ye shes med / thob pa med / ma thob pa yang med do // sh'a ri'i bu / de lta bas na /

column1: tasmAt SAriputra aprApti tvena boDisattvAnAm prajQApAramitAm ASritya pPRdu vEdya viharati citta AvaraNaH
column2: byang chub sems dpa' rnams thob pa med pa'i phyir / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la brten cing gnas te /

column1: citta AvaraNa nAstitvAt atrastaH viparyAsa atikrAntaH nizWa nirvANaH
column2: sems la sgrib pa med pas skrag pa med de / phyin ci log las shin tu 'das nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar phyin to //

column1: tri aDva vyavasTitAH sarva budDAH prajQApAramitAm ASritya anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDAH
column2: dus gsum du rnam par bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs ba la brten nas / sangs rgyas so // de ltar bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i la brten nas / sangs rgyas so // sngags / rig pa chen po'i sngags / bla na med pa'i sngags /

column1: tasmAt jQAtavyaH prajQApAramitA mahA mantraH anuttara mantraH asama sama mantraH sarva duHKa praSamana mantraH satyam amiTya tvAt prajQApmantraH tat yaTA  gate gate pAra gate pAra saMgate boDi svAhA
column2: mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i sngags / sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i sngags / mi brdzun pas na bden par shes par bya ste / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngags smras pa / tadya th'a / ga te ga te p'a ra ga te / p'a ra sam ga te / bo dhi sv'ah'a / sh'a ri'i bu /

column1: evam SAriputra gamBIrAyAm prajQApAramitAyAm caryAyAm Sikzitavyam boDisattvena
column2: de @46b lta bas na / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos / de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la bslab par bya'o //

column1: aTa Kalu BagavAn tasmAt samADeH vyutTAya Arya avalokita ISvarasya boDisattvasya sADukAram adAt  sADu sADu kula putra
column2: de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas / legs so // legs so; ;rigs kyi bu /

column1: evam etat kula putra
column2: de de bzhin no // rigs kyi bu / de de bzhin te /

column1: evam etat gamBIrAyAm prajQApAramitAyAm caryam ca rtavyam yaTA tvayA nirdizwam
column2: ji ltar khyod kyis bstan pa de bzhin du / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la spyad par bya ste /

column1: anumodyate taTAgatEH arhadBiH
column2: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang rjes su yi rang ngo //

column1: idam avocat BagavAn
column2: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /

column1: Ananda manAH AyuzmAn SAriputraH Arya avalokita ISvaraH ca boDisattvaH sA ca sarvAvatI parizad sa deva mAnuza asura ganDarvaH ca lokaH Bagavat
column2: tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dva ti'i bu dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //

bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so //// rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma la mi tra dang / lotstsha ba dge slong rin chen sdes bsgyur cing / zhus chen gyi lotstsha ba dge blo dang / @47a *// nam mkha' la sogs pas zhus te gtan la phab pa /
